column4: ok, I am now trying to burn some ubuntu live CDs, and I bought blank cds this morning, and I get an error from nautilus: There was an error writing to the CD:
The system is too slow to write the CD at this speed. Try a lower speed. Tried twodifferent drives, and two separate instances of cds.
try writing the cd at half the speed you are currently using or less, i.e. if it's 24x, burn it at 4x
